description: Clearly state the purpose or goal of the proposal, outlining what you aim to achieve or address
Define the boundaries of the proposal, specifying what will be covered and what will not be addressed.
Describe the approach or methods you intend to use to accomplish the objective, including any research or analysis techniques.
Provide a timeline or schedule for the proposed activities, outlining key milestones and deadlines.
Estimate the resources required to execute the proposal, including costs associated with materials, personnel, and any other relevant expenses.
